alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued March 20 at 12:50PM MST until March 20 at 2:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Northeastern Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 245 PM MST. * At 1249 PM MST, a dust channel was 13 miles east of Bowie, or 16 miles west of Steins. HAZARD...Less than one half mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 364 and 391. Locations impacted include... Bowie and San Simon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
